author: _pH_
text: It does take a lot of gall, but I've put some effort into understanding how they could possibly believe that. So far, it seems like they've fallen victim to the alt-right playbook (youtube series of videos, i highly recommend them). To describe it in a sentence: they're in an abusive relationship with alt-right ideology, that works to isolate them from nonbelievers by feeding them dog whistles that are offensive, but only if you know the dog whistle; and by feeding them "edgy" humor that's actually just plain racist/homophobic/transphobic, which they then repeat and are socially ostracized for. Repeat that enough times, and suddenly their only source of information is the alt-right, and they think they're victims of the "culture war" and "cancel culture".

text:
